title: The predictive role of Systemic Inflammation Response Index (SIRI), Neutrophil-Lymphocyte Ratio (NLR), and Platelet-Lymphocyte Ratio (PLR) in the prognosis of acute coronary syndrome in a tertiary care hospital
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20
